description: This table contains over time single information for claim reconciliation records.

columns.name: CLAIM_REC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the claim, in external format.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date of the claim, in internal format.

columns.name: CLM_STATUS_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status code of the claim being tracked over time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unmapped code received

columns.name: PAYR_CLM_AMT_SUBMT
columns.description: The amount submitted by the payer on this claim.

columns.name: PAYOR_CLM_AMT_PAID
columns.description: The amount paid by the payer on this claim.

columns.name: PAYOR_REF_NUM
columns.description: The claim's payer reference number.

columns.name: PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The payer name of the payer on the claim.

columns.name: CH_REF_NUM
columns.description: This is the claim's clearinghouse reference number.

columns.name: CH_NAME
columns.description: This is the claim's clearinghouse name.

columns.name: CLAIM_STATUS_MSG
columns.description: The claim's textual status message.

columns.name: STATUS_DATE
columns.description: The status date of the claim.

columns.name: FILE_NAME
columns.description: This is the filename associated with this claim.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: ID of the deployment owner for this contact.

columns.name: CLM_CLOSED_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value for the reason the claim was closed. This value can be used to link to the ZC_CLM_CLSD_REASON table to get more information on the category values.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payment


Posting Action


External Status Change


Bucket Closed


Bucket Rejected


Bucket Replaced


Bucket Reopened


Invoice Split During Refresh

columns.name: CLAIM_ST_CAT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category code of the claim being tracked over time.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unmapped code received

columns.name: TRANSMIT_MEDIUM_C_NAME
columns.description:
If claim has been transmitted, this item stores the medium.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Paper


Electronic

columns.name: ERR_FIELD
columns.description: The field a claim error is reported in.

columns.name: ERR_ITEM
columns.description: The item for which the claim error was reported.

columns.name: ERR_VAL
columns.description: The claim value that caused the error.

columns.name: ERR_MSG
columns.description: The error message received for a claim.

columns.name: CH_SENT_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date that the claim was sent out of the clearinghouse.

columns.name: PAYOR_RECV_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date that the payer received the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_SEL_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the action that was selected to be performed on the invoice.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Action


Accept Claim


Send to WQ

columns.name: CLAIM_ACT_INFO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Can store additional information on why a given action was selected.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


File payor does not match CLP payor


Billing system mismatch


Claim not on claim run


Claim run not in status of processed


Unable to lock CLP


No codes mapped to Send to WQ

columns.name: TRANSMIT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the system transmission status for the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Transmitted


Transmit Success


Transmit Failed


Retransmit Success


Retransmit Failed


Queued

columns.name: EXTERNAL_REJECT_YN
columns.description:
Yes/No flag indicating that the claim has been rejected by the payor or clearinghouse.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PERFORM_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Will store the action that was performed on the invoice.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No Action


Accept Claim from Run


Send to WQ from Run


Accept from WQ


Resubmit from WQ


Resend to WQ


External Test Response No Action Mapped

columns.name: PERFORM_ACT_RSN
columns.description: Stores the reason for the action that was performed on the invoice.

columns.name: GROUP_CONTROL_NUM
columns.description: Stores the group control number (GS-06) value for an American National Standards Institute (ANSI) electronic claim file.

columns.name: TRANSMIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Records electronic claim transmission type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Automatic Transmission


CORE Transmission

columns.name: PAYOR_CONTACT_NAME
columns.description: Name of contact person or department associated with an information request.

columns.name: CLAIM_BILL_TYPE
columns.description: This is the bill type received in the claim reconciliation file.

columns.name: MRN
columns.description: This is the medical record number (MRN) received in the claim reconciliation file.

columns.name: INTERMEDIARY_IDENT
columns.description: This is the transmission identifier received in the claim reconciliation file.

columns.name: AGENCY_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: This is the claim number received in the claim reconciliation file.

columns.name: CASE_REF_IDENT
columns.description: This is the case reference identifier received in the claim reconciliation file.

columns.name: INFO_REQ_NUM
columns.description: This is the attachment request tracking number received in the claim reconciliation file.

columns.name: PRIOR_INFO_REQ_NUM
columns.description: This is the prior attachment request tracking number received in the claim reconciliation file.

columns.name: INFO_REQ_DUE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the requested information is to be returned.

columns.name: RESP_CONTACT_NAME
columns.description: Name used by the payer for routing the requested information within their system.

columns.name: RESP_CONTACT_CITY
columns.description: City of the mailing location for the return of attachment data.

columns.name: RESP_CONTACT_STATE
columns.description: State of the mailing location for the return of attachment data.

columns.name: RESP_CONTACT_ZIP
columns.description: Postal Code of the mailing location for the return of attachment data.

columns.name: RESP_CONTACT_CNTRY
columns.description: Country of the mailing location for the return of attachment data.

columns.name: RESP_CONTACT_SUBDIV
columns.description: Subdivision of the mailing location for the return of attachment data.

columns.name: SUPPORTED_ACTIONS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The claim actions supported by the interface profile at the time a claim status update is received from an external entity.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accept Claim


Send to Workqueue


All Available Actions

columns.name: TX_DEST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The destination type when the claim is transmitted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payer


Clearinghouse


Other Entity

columns.name: PAYER_CHECK_DATE
columns.description: Holds the payer check date from claim reconciliation.

columns.name: PAYER_CHECK_NUM
columns.description: Holds the payer check number from claim reconciliation.
